snippet: After big hits in the dot-com boom, Kleiner Perkins has been sideswiped by a series of lackluster bets in green technology and missed chances in social media.
abstract: After big hits in the dot-com boom, Kleiner Perkins has been sideswiped by a series of lackluster bets in green technology and missed chances in social media.

headline.main: A Humbled Kleiner Perkins Adjusts Its Strategy
headline.print_headline: A Humbled Kleiner Perkins Adjusts Its Strategy
